text: F1 Career Challenge (also known as F1 Challenge '99-'02 for Windows) is an racing video game developed by Image Space Incorporate and Visual Science and also published by EA Sports. It was based on the four seasons: the 1999 Formula One season, the 2000 Formula One season, the 2001 Formula One season, and the 2002 Formula One season. It is the final installment of the Formula One video game published by EA Games, until F1 2021, before EA purchased by Codemasters. title: F1 Career Challenge
